author: rekovic
body:
Reverting the revert of No Hack Conditions for L1T, by reverting commit cddc18fde9d0fbbf4e0639d7d76926020bddfb45.

Plus, with the last commit fa19aae, it reverts for AlCa run2_mc_hi to use the correct tag `93X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v0` which contains payloads for Stage1, needed for previously failing wf 145.0.
title: Revert "Revert "[94X] L1 no hack conditions - cleaned""
